// paths for each block in UP-DOWN-LEFT-RIGHT binary format
// example: 00 = blocked from all sides
// example: 11 = walkable

:paths
00 11 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 11 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 11 11 11
00 11 00 00 00 00 00 11 11 00 00 11 00 00
00 11 00 00 00 00 00 11 11 00 00 11 00 00
00 11 00 00 00 00 00 11 11 00 00 11 00 00
00 11 00 00 00 00 00 11 11 11 11 11 00 00
00 11 00 00 00 00 00 11 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 11 00 00 00 00 00 11 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 11 11 11 11 11 11 11 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00

// textures for given map cells
:textures
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
